trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un contratto che i componenti possono utilizzare per accedere a informazioni relative a un evento superando i limiti di domini applicazione e processi.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> fornisce informazioni su un evento di un oggetto remoto che implementa il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Per accedere a uno o pi√π eventi di un oggetto remoto, utilizzare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> metodo per ottenere un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> che rappresenta il tipo dell'oggetto remoto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il metodo utilizzato per aggiungere un delegato del gestore eventi all'evento identificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> che rappresenta il metodo utilizzato per aggiungere un delegato del gestore eventi all'evento identificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" />.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un delegato all'evento, chiamare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> metodo il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> che <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> restituisce.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passare un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> che rappresenta il delegato di `parameters` parametro di <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.

A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData" /> that provides information about the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData" /> che fornisce informazioni sull'evento identificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" />.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni fornite dal <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> struttura include il nome dell'evento e il tipo che dichiara l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il metodo utilizzato per rimuovere un delegato del gestore eventi dall'evento identificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> che rappresenta il metodo utilizzato per rimuovere un delegato del gestore eventi dall'evento identificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" />.

trans-unit.source: To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere un delegato dall'evento, chiamare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> metodo il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> che <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> restituisce.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Passare un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> che rappresenta il delegato di `parameters` parametro di <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
